name: EraseYuniqlCLI
description: Erase database objects with Yuniql CLI using version acquired from Use Yuniql task.
author: Rodel E. Dagumampan

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of Yuniql CLI to use. If omitted, the latest version of Yuniql CLI is installed. Visit the [releases](https://github.com/rdagumampan/yuniql/releases) to get an appropriate version.

inputs.name: connectionString
inputs.label: Database connection string
inputs.helpMarkDown: The connection string to your target database server.

inputs.name: workspacePath
inputs.label: Target workspace directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location of your version directories to run.

inputs.name: targetPlatform
inputs.label: Target platform
inputs.helpMarkDown: The target database platform. Default is SqlServer.

inputs.name: tokenKeyValuePair
inputs.label: Token key/value pairs
inputs.helpMarkDown: Token key/value pairs for token replacement.
